item.description:
One of the most underseen, and polarizing releases of year 2012, yet still grabbing 4 major Oscar nominations (Best Picture, Director, Adapted Screenplay, Lead Actress). And even more amazing is the fact that the Oscar Nominated lead, Quvenzhan√© Wallis, is only 9!

Beasts of the Southern Wild has been getting a ton of awards as well.

Anyway, this is out of theaters right now, but... it's already available for home release, and I own the Blu-ray (haven't gotten around to watching it yet). Let's figure out a time, before the Oscars, to get get together and watch it!

My wife and I would love to have a group over for this. Generally speaking, a weekend would work best for us, but we could also do a Monday or Thursday. Chime in on the comments for when works best for you! Runtime is 90 min, so I'd anticipate a 7:30p start so we're not done super late.

Assuming this goes through, like Dan's been doing, I'll let confirmed attendees know our actual address the day before the event (we're near Greendale Mall in Northern Worcester). The posted one is fake, of course. We have a 1080p front projector w/ ~90" screen, and a nice 5.1 surround setup. Our movie room isn't huge, but we can fairly comfortably fit 5-6 on couch/chairs, and a little less comfortably fit 3-4 more on beanbags on the floor.

We'll try to have some popcorn on hand, and of course we'll have unlimited water to drink. Feel free to bring your own beverages and/or snacks.

Oh yeah, just in case, since I hear bird allergies do happen, we have two parakeets here as well.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Beasts of the Southern Wild
